responses.rationale: The segment states a factual quantity without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment provides factual data on production status and quantity without high-potency language.
Describes a negative fact (having to kill birds) with scale, but uses factual language ('having to kill') not high-potency verbs.
Describes a negative fact (having to kill birds) with scale, but uses factual language ('have had to kill') not high-potency verbs.
Describes negative facts (infected farms, forcing killing) with scale, but uses factual language ('infected', 'forcing the killing') not high-potency verbs.
The segment states factual locations of cases without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
Describes a factual confirmation with scale, but uses factual language ('confirmed') not high-potency verbs.
The segment states a factual number of states with cases without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment provides a factual explanation for disease spread without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
